name: Floating Cloud God Saves The Pilgrims
name_original: Floating Cloud God Saves The Pilgrims
description:
Take on the role of pilgrim protector! Float and shoot your way through seven beautifully drawn worlds, blast weird and wonderful enemies, and save your followers from certain doom.
